messages.content: What is the purpose of the select_folder_path_easy extension in ComfyUI?
The select_folder_path_easy extension in ComfyUI makes it easy to manage the output destination path of generated images by simply connecting nodes.
How can you install the select_folder_path_easy extension?

To install the select_folder_path_easy extension, navigate to the custom_nodes directory in your ComfyUI installation and run the command: git clone https://github.com/Umikaze-job/select_folder_path_easy
What is the first step in using the select_folder_path_easy extension?
The first step in using the select_folder_path_easy extension is to right-click the [Save Image] node and click [Convert filename_prefix to input].
How do you connect the select_folder_path_easy and Save Image nodes?
After converting the filename_prefix to input in the Save Image node, simply connect the [select folder path easy] and [Save Image] nodes.
What does the folder_name parameter in select_folder_path_easy specify?
The folder_name parameter in select_folder_path_easy specifies the folder name for the output destination.
How is the file name determined when using select_folder_path_easy?
When using select_folder_path_easy, the file name is determined by specifying the file_name parameter, and the resulting file name will be [file_name]_[image ID].png.
What does the time_format parameter in select_folder_path_easy specify?
The time_format parameter in select_folder_path_easy specifies the format of the time folder.
What is the purpose of the select_folder_path_easy extension?
The select_folder_path_easy extension simplifies the specification of the output folder for generated images in ComfyUI by connecting nodes and specifying the output path to a manageable location.
How can you install the select_folder_path_easy extension?

To install the select_folder_path_easy extension, navigate to the ComfyUI custom_nodes directory in the command line and run the command: git clone https://github.com/Umikaze-job/select_folder_path_easy
What is the first step in using the select_folder_path_easy extension?
The first step in using the select_folder_path_easy extension is to right-click on the [Save Image] node and click on [Convert filename_prefix to input].
What is the second step in using the select_folder_path_easy extension?
The second step in using the select_folder_path_easy extension is to connect the [select folder path easy] node and the [Save Image] node.
What does the 'folder_name' parameter in the select_folder_path_easy extension specify?
The 'folder_name' parameter in the select_folder_path_easy extension specifies the name of the folder where the generated images will be saved.
What does the 'file_name' parameter in the select_folder_path_easy extension specify?
The 'file_name' parameter in the select_folder_path_easy extension specifies the file name for the generated images. The files will be named as '[file_name]_[image_id].png'.
What does the 'time_format' parameter in the select_folder_path_easy extension specify?
The 'time_format' parameter in the select_folder_path_easy extension specifies the format of the time folder where the generated images will be saved.
